column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We also ordered "The Lou" (spinach
column2: mushrooms and sliced tomatoes with mozzarella
column3: romano and cheddar cheese.) and the "The "Malnati Chicago Classic" (lean sausage
column4: vine-ripened tomato sauce on our famous Buttercrust). There were a lot of tomatoes on The Lou
